question:
43. Answer the questions    Dear Johnathan
Please don't forget to pick up our son at 12 o'clock at his school. And also on forget to take his fou
lunch, he would love to have some spaghetti and ice cream
With love, Plumary
a. Who is receive the short message?
b. Who is sending the short message?
c. What must Johnathan do?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A.Johnathan

B.Plumary

C.Pick up his son at 12 o'clock dan give his lunch to him

Jawaban:

a. Plumary's husband

b. Plumary is sending the short message

c. He must pick up their son at 12 o'clock at his school

Penjelasan:

Moga berguna

related_questions.question:
Que Sera Sera    By Doris Day
When I was just a little girl
I asked my mother
What will I be
Will I be pretty?
Will I be rich?
Here's what she said to me
Que sera, sera
Whatever will be, will be
The future's not ours to see
Que sera, sera
What will be, will be
Source : duniashinichi.blogspot.co.id
Questions:
1. What is the meaning of “The future's not ours to see"?
Answer:
HOTS
2.
What does the writer ask to her mother?
HOTS
Answer:
HOTS
3. What does mother say to her?
Answer:
(HOTS
4. What is the meaning of “Que Sera Sera"?
Answer:
HOTS
5. What does the lyric explain about?
Answer:
ngs you want to see to happen.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. artinya, masa depan bukan milik kita untuk dilihat. maksutnya kita tidak tahu masa depan.

2. the writer ask what will she be in the future

3. her mother says, "whatever will be, the future's not our to see. what will be, will be"

4. apa yang akan terjadi, akan terjadi. in English, what will be, will be.

the livingroom. (16) a sport magazine. My sister, Arsy ... (17) bear doll
. My
mother (18) her tea My Daddy ... (19) hot chocolate into his cup.

below!

we didn't go to the beach yesterday

"there's one thing you should know. you've got a place to go" the lyrics means ... c. through the song, the singer wants the listener to know about​

1. Friend

2. You can go to your friend when yo don't know where to go

related_questions.question: Contoh percakapan 5 orang tentang borrowing a book the library

answers.answer:
andi : hi guys , how are you ? , have you guys prepared for tomorrow’s lesson

marsya : hi andi , we’re good , what lesson?

andi : it’s english lesson mr. thomas will be teaching us tomorrow but i lost my book

sari : “ oh my god i forgot tomorrow will be the most important lesson , if we dont bring the book mr. thomas will get mad at us “

tono : “ guys relaxx .. we have library in our school “

joey : “ yeah .. that’s right you guys no need to worry mrs . milla will help us to find the book “

andi : “ thank god , i thought our school doesn’t provide us that kind of book we wanted “

marsya : “ well ... let’s go to library then before its close “

andi : “ alright “
